data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Sorsogon who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sorsogon, Philippines

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 129,574 people in the state of Sorsogon who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sorsogon, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, give the disciples of the the state of Sorsogon an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 144,770 people in Sorsogon who are far from you. Please add 33 new house churches this year.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Manobo, Cotabato people.
Lord, let it be said of the 144,770 lost in Sorsogon that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Sorsogon, Philippines to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Sorsogon. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

location.name: Sorsogon
